summary: Feature request to document comparison between the official Temporal Ruby SDK and the Coinbase Temporal Ruby library, including motivation for the separate project, key differences, and use case guidance.
userImpact: Users unfamiliar with the Ruby Temporal ecosystem may be confused about which library to use and lack guidance on choosing between implementations.
proposedFix: Add comparison section to README explaining the differences between the official SDK and Coinbase's temporal-ruby library
resolutionDetails: SDK was undergoing rewrite/refresh and this issue became inapplicable to the new version
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
